SLF Postcode Lookup File Path

Source: R/get_slf_lookup_paths.R
get_slf_postcode_path.Rd

Get the full path to the SLF Postcode lookup

Usage

get_slf_postcode_path(update = latest_update(), ...)

Arguments

update

the update month (defaults to use latest_update())

...

additional arguments passed to get_file_path()

Value

The path to the SLF Postcode lookup as an fs::path()

See also

get_file_path() for the generic function.

Other slf lookup file path: get_combined_slf_deaths_lookup_path(), get_slf_ch_name_lookup_path(), get_slf_chi_deaths_path(), get_slf_deaths_lookup_path(), get_slf_gpprac_path()

On this page
